"A.P.238/4/9/11:00": "Testing, testing... What am I saying! I don't need a mic test!"
"I'll just use the power of my photons to project my voice out to everyone!"

"Fun-loving, yet deadly serious!
It's me, Huey! Number Six of the Council of Six, and the organizer of this tournament! A pleasure to meet you!"
"...Hmm, I can't see your reactions clearly through the monitor."
"Well, everyone's excited, so I don't care!"
"Thank you all for participating in the ARKS Battle Championship! I only regret that, as the main organizer, I can't join you."
"I can't take part in such a fun event! ...Damn, I didn't think about that!"
"Now, the details of the tournament... Don't worry about the rules! Only one thing matters!"
"Those who are strongest will do best! That's how it goes!"

"So, you guys...
Hey, don't disturb me. I'm giving a speech right now!"
"...Damn it! Hi-ya! I'm on the admin team too, let me talk!"
"Heheh... All ARKS! Can you hear my voice!"
"I'm the illustrious Claris Claes! I'm Number Five of the Council of Six! And I'm one of the Three Heroes!"
"I've got a hand in this tournament too! You'd better enjoy it!"
"I'll be having all the fun in the end! Heheh, I'm looking forward to it...!"
"Hey, Claris Claes! Don't say another word! It won't be any fun if it's not a surprise!"
"Well, it's almost time for the tournament to begin!"
"And, Claris Claes. You're talking way too much."
"I know, I know!"
"Then let the ARKS Battle Championship-"
"Begin! Yay, yay!"
